name: ConnectOne Bancorp, Inc.
description: ConnectOne Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company based in New Jersey that operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, ConnectOne Bank. Founded in 2005, the company aims to provide a full range of banking services tailored to meet the needs of individuals, families, and businesses. ConnectOne Bank focuses on delivering personalized banking experiences, leveraging advanced technology to enhance customer interactions. The bank offers a variety of financial products, including commercial and residential loans, deposit accounts, and treasury management services. With a commitment to community engagement, ConnectOne Bancorp actively participates in local initiatives and provides financial support to various charitable organizations. The company's mission is centered around building strong relationships with customers and fostering economic development in the communities it serves. ConnectOne Bancorp has experienced significant growth through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, positioning itself as a competitive player in the regional banking landscape. The company is dedicated to maintaining high standards of customer service, financial performance, and community involvement while adapting to the evolving needs of the marketplace.

seo.meta_title: ConnectOne Bancorp, Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover ConnectOne Bancorp, Inc., a New Jersey-based bank offering personalized banking services for individuals and businesses. Explore our commitment to community engagement and financial growth.

faq.question: What services does ConnectOne Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: ConnectOne Bancorp offers a variety of banking services including commercial loans, residential mortgages, savings accounts, and treasury management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ConnectOne Bancorp?
faq.answer: Frank Sorrentino is the CEO of ConnectOne Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is ConnectOne Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: ConnectOne Bancorp is headquartered in Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey, USA.
